body_html:
It happens for MarginRankingLoss(*some_inputs). A user internally ran into the same issue (I'll send you the link) and I was able to reproduce.

Pretty sure it happens when the memory at default_bool isn't valid, but I can't find a small case to reproduce.

body:
It happens for `MarginRankingLoss(*some_inputs)`. A user internally ran into the same issue (I'll send you the link) and I was able to reproduce.

Pretty sure it happens when the memory at `default_bool` isn't valid, but I can't find a small case to reproduce.
